welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Altenburg, Germany! Get ready to be charmed by our historic architecture, rich cultural heritage, and famous playing card tradition. We hope you have a wonderful stay and discover all the delights our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Altenburg Nobitz Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal used for charter and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wilmington Railway Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including shops, restaurants, and lounges.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Wilmington Railway Airport provides services for passengers traveling to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.
